allow:
Bash(/tmp/verify_fix.ps1 <<'PSEOF'
$results9 = Select-String -Path 'D:\\PROGRAMMING\\AONIX PROJECTS\\Tata_fire_test\\eagle_ai_external_website\\templates\\*.html' -Pattern 'mobile_fix_9' -SimpleMatch
$results10 = Select-String -Path 'D:\\PROGRAMMING\\AONIX PROJECTS\\Tata_fire_test\\eagle_ai_external_website\\templates\\*.html' -Pattern 'mobile_fix_10' -SimpleMatch
Write-Output "Remaining 'mobile_fix_9' occurrences: $\($results9.Count\)"
Write-Output "'mobile_fix_10' occurrences: $\($results10.Count\)"
Write-Output ""
Write-Output "Files with mobile_fix_10:"
$results10 | ForEach-Object { Write-Output "  $\($_.Filename\):$\($_.LineNumber\): $\($_.Line.Trim\(\)\)" }
PSEOF)
